name: Gone Nuts!
description:
This was a submission for the Ukie Student Game Jam 2018.

I worked as a programmer/designer in a group of 5 people to produce a game in 30 hours around the theme "Change".

In this game you play a squirrel running around storing nuts for the winter, avoiding the perils of the changing seasons. When winter comes, you'd best hope you've stored enough nuts, because they are the only thing keeping you from certain death!

How to play:

Avoid cars and enemy squirrels, and take any nuts you find back to the home tree.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around, E to eat nuts at your home tree during the winter and space to jump.

U is a debug key that will quickly flick through the seasons.

Team:

Artist - Hannah Walters - https://www.artstation.com/nauticalnuisance

Programmer - Aaron Green

Programmer - Jakub Dabosz

Programmer - Stuart Yule-Wright

Programmer - Lee Sinfield

Design - Everyone
